aws_apigatewayv2_domain_name.subcategory: API Gateway v2 (WebSocket and HTTP APIs)
aws_apigatewayv2_domain_name.description: Manages an Amazon API Gateway Version 2 domain name.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the domain name.

certificate_arn.description: The ARN of an AWS-managed certificate that will be used by the endpoint for the domain name. AWS Certificate Manager is the only supported source.

hosted_zone_id.description: The Amazon Route 53 Hosted Zone ID of the endpoint.

api_mapping_selection_expression.description: The [API mapping selection expression](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-selection-expressions.html#apigateway-websocket-api-mapping-selection-expressions) for the domain name.

arn.description: The ARN of the domain name.
